name: .Net/Duel
description:
This product is still considered in Alpha. Not all features listed are currently implemented. Servers are currently for testing purposes only on Friday, Saturday, & Sunday between 5PM-8PM EST.

Login , customize your A.I. Battle Companion, and duel your way to the #1 spot!

In .Net/Duel you'll take on the role of the operator and be linked to a Sybil, an A.I. Battle Companion that you can customize to make unique to you! Take your Sybil into battle, unlock new customization, gain accolades for your duels, and SO MUCH MORE!

Master Deep 1v1 Combat

  • Easy to Learn, Hard to Master. A deep and rewarding combat system that rewards skilled play. Utilize careful positioning, quick reflexes and execute skills perfectly to claim the #1 spot.
  • Over 30 initial ‘Codes’ (Special Skills) to mix and match with to find the playstyle that fits you.

Fashion Is The Future

  • Customize your Sybil! Mix and match head, limbs, chest and leg pieces to make your Sybil unique to you!
  • Change your looks, change your color, and show the rest of the ‘Net’ your own personal style.

Join our Discord Community : https://discord.gg/eCnJHSTNBw
Follow Us on Twitter :https://twitter.com/NetDuel

Check out our website:https://netduelgame.com/
